content.rendered:
The Final Exam Schedule can be found by logging into La Verne Portal and clicking on Office of the Registrar, which can be found under My Communities.  Once there, you’ll be able to look up your final exam time by entering the CRN, Course Number or Instructor name in the search box.

All courses must meet during Finals Week.

For all courses that normally meet after 3:30PM, the Final Exam will be held during the regularly scheduled class time in Finals Week.

Faculty: If your final exam requires special arrangements or if the final exam information is incorrect please contact the Office of the Registrar at reg@laverne.edu.
